verses.text: Ach in Diosal, a ach tza b'o yaj in lolonel, tak'wej in ayic tzin awaj t'ayach. Ayic ay in och t'a syaelal ix in a colani. Ok'ocab' a k'ool t'ayin ticnaik, ab' tas swal t'a in lesal tik.
Ex wetanimail, ¿b'aq'uinh ol eyactejcan eyalan in pecal? ¿B'aq'uinh ol eyactejcan eyalan lolonel malaj yelk'ochi? ¿B'aq'uinh ol eyactejcan he sayan tas manh yeloc?
Ab'ec, a Jehová ix sik'ancanel heb' anima ayoch spensar t'ay, yic wach' tz'och heb' yicoc. Ayic tzin awaj t'ay, stak'wi t'ayin.
Xiwanhec d'ha Dios, yic manhxo ol och he mul. Ayic jichan ex eq'ui, a wal yic te numan, tze b'eyk'olan he b'a.
Hak'ek och Jehová yipoc he k'ool, aq'ek he silab' t'ay icha wal t'a smojal.
Tzijtum heb' tz'alani: ¿Mach ol ch'oxan swach'il t'ayonh? xchi heb'. Mamin Jehová, ch'ox a wach'k'olal t'ayonh.
Ha ach ix ak'cot tzalajk'olal t'ayin, ek'to t'a yichanh stzalajk'olal heb' niwan tas syik' t'a smunlajel.
Malaj tas tzin na' ayic tzin ek' jichan, te junk'olal tzin wayi. Mamin Jehová, a ach ton ayach och wed'oc, yuj chi' malaj tas tzin ik'ani.
